description: Magic: The Gathering fans can look forward to a crossover with Final Fantasy as Wizards of the Coast prepares to launch this set as the third main MTG release of 2025. Scheduled for a global release on June 13, 2025, in paper form, the set is expected to debut slightly earlier on MTG Arena. Prerelease...
title: Magic: The Gathering Final Fantasy Set to Release June 2025

description: WizKids has revealed Dungeons & Dragons: Edge of the Realms – Fields of Faerun, a new map-building game set to release in June. Designed by Phil Walker-Harding, known for games like Barenpark and Imhotep, this upcoming title allows players to explore the continent of Faerun within the Forgotten Realms universe. In Edge of the Realms...
title: WizKids Announces New Map-Building Game for Dungeons & Dragons Fans: Edge of the Realms

description: Games Workshop is preparing for the launch of a new edition of Warhammer Underworlds, with the Embergard core set available for pre-order next week. The Embergard set brings updated rules, warbands, and Rivals decks centered on four different playstyles. The set includes two warbands: the Emberwatch, a team of Stormcast Eternals from the Vanguard Chamber,...
title: Warhammer Underworlds: Embergard Edition Arrives Next Week, Plus New Releases from Games Workshop

description: Magic: The Gathering recently presented its vision for the future at MagicCon Las Vegas, introducing a long-term foundational set, a Netflix adaptation, and several collaborative crossovers. The event highlighted product innovations, community-focused structural updates, and an expanded narrative direction. At the center of the announcements was the Foundations set, a new permanent addition to MTG’s...
title: Magic: The Gathering Shares New Foundations Set, Netflix Series, and Crossovers

description: Maestro Media’s new tabletop RPG, The Smurfs: Roleplaying Game, launched on Kickstarter to a positive response from the community, achieving full funding in just 18 minutes. Designed by Kevin Borrup, known for BURN 2d6 and other titles, the game offers family-friendly adventures set in the beloved world of The Smurfs. Players can dive into unique...
title: Maestro Media’s ‘The Smurfs: Roleplaying Game’ Fully Funded on Kickstarter Within Minutes

description: On October 30th, HOUF Games will introduce Nice to Know! Animals on Kickstarter, a new board game combining strategy with educational content centered around wildlife and conservation. Designed for players interested in animals and environmental themes, the game aims to balance strategic gameplay with information on various species, including endangered animals. Developed over two years...
title: Wildlife-Themed Board Game ‘Nice to Know! Animals’ Coming to Kickstarter October 30th

description: Espers, an upcoming tabletop role-playing game by Rookie Jet Studios, will launch on Kickstarter on November 1st. This original RPG combines deck-building mechanics with fantasy and anime-inspired themes, allowing players to take on the roles of Espers—powerful magic-wielders capable of bending reality. Set against the backdrop of the Myrillian Empire, a regime known for its...
title: Espers: An Anime-Inspired Deck-Building Fantasy Opera RPG of Magic and Rebellion – Coming to Kickstarter Nov 1st

description: The Call of Cthulhu role-playing game has been officially inducted into the ENNIE Awards Hall of Fame, recognizing its lasting impact on tabletop gaming and horror storytelling. This announcement, made on October 26, marks the second entry in the Hall of Fame as part of the ENNIE Awards’ 25th anniversary celebration, with one game honored...
title: Call of Cthulhu Inducted into the ENNIE Awards Hall of Fame

description: Games Workshop has announced pre-orders for a range of new releases, including a Kill Team starter set, several specialized kill teams, standalone miniatures, and publications from Black Library. The Kill Team: Starter Set includes two kill teams—Angels of Death and Plague Marines—each with seven detailed push-fit operatives. The set also offers full-color MDF terrain, a...
title: Games Workshop Opens Pre-orders for New Kill Team Starter Set, Models, and Black Library Releases

description: Hit Point Press has acquired the Badge Quest RPG intellectual property from its original creator, Dave “DMDave” Hamrick. The game, which raised over $140,000 on Kickstarter in 2023, follows players as members of the Brave Blossoms, a girls’ youth group solving mysteries and confronting monsters. The acquisition enables Hit Point Press to take over the...
title: Hit Point Press Acquires Badge Quest RPG from DM Dave
